body:
Under "Shell support:" "If you want to have Spack’s shell support available on the command line at any login you can put this source line in one of the files that are sourced at startup ..."
(highlited as code): spack load / unload

Um, really? You want me to put **spack load / unload** in my .cshrc? I don't think so. I think it should be something like:
  spack load <foo>
  spack unload <foo>
However, it's totally unclear what "foo" is: something I've built/compiled? What exactly am I supposed to do here?
title: readthedocs is confusing
